Package gui

Class OrderAVisitController

java.lang.Object
gui.OrderAVisitController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class OrderAVisitController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This Class is the GUI controller of OrderVisit.fxml It handles all the JavaFx nodes events. In this screen the traveler, group guide can order new visit
